name: css-exclude
description: postcss processor to remove css selectors with annotations

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Jan Nicklas <j.nicklas@me.com> (https://github.com/jantimon)
